parameters.query: select TO_CHAR(rqst_delv_dt, 'MM/DD/YY') AS Requested_Del_Date,channel_desc AS Channel,ship_name AS "Ship to Name",sls_doc AS "Sales Doc",matl_id AS "Material Code", matl_desc AS Material, sum(future_gts_val) AS "Future GTS",sum(fut_sls_qty) AS "Future Qty",sum(unspp_qty) AS "Unsupplied Qty" from PCFEDW_INTEGRATION.EDW_INVOICE_ANALYSIS where to_ccy='USD'and jj_mnth_long='{CurrMonth}' and jj_year='{CurrYear}' and NTS_VAL!=0 group by rqst_delv_dt,channel_desc,ship_name,sls_doc,matl_id, matl_desc having sum(fut_sls_qty) != 0  and sum(NTS_VAL) !=0;
